query:
SELECT 
            b.id as "id!",
            b.cover_image,
            s.name as status_name
        FROM list_books lb
        INNER JOIN books b ON lb.book_id = b.id
        LEFT JOIN reading_status rs ON rs.book_id = b.id AND rs.user_id = ?
        LEFT JOIN status s ON rs.status_id = s.id
        WHERE lb.list_id = ?
        ORDER BY lb.position
